column4: Generally I've never came across any problems except with flash and even that is solved in the new Ubuntu I heard.
flash is solved in gutsy, piece of cake now
That's quite cool, thanks. I installed 32-bit on purpose to avoid the weird dependency hell for flash I had, and then I heard about it being allegedly solved ;-)
yea, the flash package on gutsy installs and configures nspluginwrapper for you automatically, its quite easy
